info.title: Dokobit Universal API
info.description: Dokobit Universal API is a versatile tool that enables signing documents internally, within your system, and collecting signatures from 3rd parties outside your system, using a wide variety of eID tools. Document signing takes place in an accountless Dokobit signing interface with your organization's branding.

post.summary: Dokobit Universal API - Create External Signing
post.description: External signing initiates asynchronous signing request from your system. In this case user receives an email for signing and you will get a callback once he signs the document.

postback_url.description: URL of your system to handle webhooks.

deadline.description: Signing deadline date with specified timezone fragment. Example: 2018-11-05T13:15:30Z.

hard_deadline.description: If set to `true` participants won’t be able to sign this document after set `deadline`. Default: `false`

require_qualified_signatures.description: Allow to sign only with qualified signatures. Default: `false`

annotation_position.description: You can choose the position of signature annotations on a PDF document. Available values: `first_top`|`first_bottom`|`last_top`|`last_bottom`|`none`. Default: `first_top`

annotation_personal_code.description: If set to `true` personal code will be visible in annotation. Only applicable for PDF type signing. Default: `false`

allow_video_identification.description: Allow to sign using video-based identification. Default: `false`

allow_document_saving.description: Allow user to save document to the Dokobit Portal and make further actions. Default: `true`.

flatten_pdf.description: If set to true the document will be flattened so that the form fields become part of the document content and cannot be edited after signing. Only applicable for PDF type signing.

allowed_signing_methods.description: Allow only specific signing methods. Available values: `mobile`, `smartid`, `smartcard`, `eparaksts_mobile`, `bankid_no`, `bankid_se`, `audkenni_app`, `ftn`, `mitid`, `nemid`, `electronic_id`, `itsme`, `idin`, `swisscom`

files.description: File or files to be signed.

external_id.description: Unique signer identifier from your system. You can generate random identifiers if you do not have one.

country_code.description: Participant's country code. Required if personal code is provided.

sequence.description: Allows setting up the sequence order of document approving and signing actions.

notifications_language.description: Sets the language for notifications. Available values: `en`, `lt`, `lv`, `ee`, `is`, `no`.

external_id.description: Unique signer identifier from your system. You can generate random identifiers if you do not have one.
external_id.title: External ID

post.description: Dokobit is an eIDAS-certified service provider for qualified e-signature and e-seal validations. Use this action to upload a signed file for validation. Supported file types: `.asice` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.asics` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-s+zip|`.sce` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.bdoc` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.edoc` - application/vnd.etsi.asic-e+zip|`.pdf` - application/pdf|`.p7s` - application/pkcs7-signature|`.xml` - application/xml
